CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In Figure 3a , both of the absorption spectra recorded from dilute chloroform solutions display π-π* transitions at around 425 nm and large charge transfer features between 500 and 700 nm which are assigned by analogy to similar polymers , corresponding to intramolecular charge transfer ( ICT ) between the acceptor ( BT / BO ) and donor ( NDT ) units.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| chloroform |
| BT / BO units |
| NDT units |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| chloroform |
| BT / BO units |
| NDT units |

These are the entities in the paragraph that can be identified as material names. Chloroform is the solvent used in the experiment, while BT / BO and NDT are the units or components of the polymers involved in the intramolecular charge transfer process.
